data.name: Drunken Wrestlers 2: Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The soundtrack for Drunken Wrestlers 2 consists of heavy bass music.

Contents:


01. Horizontal - Everywhere (DW2 OST Edit) [Hybrid Trap/Riddim Dubstep]
02. Pvndorum88 - DW2 OST Track 1 [Dubstep]
03. Shalkii - Unity [Synthwave/Dubstep]
04. Shalkii - Overheat [Dubstep]
05. Horizontal - Game0ver (DW2 OST Edit) [Hybrid Trap]
06. Skymo - Alone [Future Bass]
07. Skymo - Crossed Out [Dubstep]
08. Skymo - Meow [Glitch Hop]
09. Skymo - Dopamine [Electro House]
10. Skymo - Jolly Roger [Dubstep]
11. Skymo - The Hero [Dubstep]
12. SkutteOleg - Shadows [Drumstep]

+ 12 unfinished/WIP tracks

Format: .mp3, 320 kbps

The soundtrack will be placed in your game directory:
...Steam\steamapps\common\Drunken Wrestlers 2\Soundtrack
